Package index

All functions

dataset_page_browser()
Open a webpage for the given dataset
dataset_sharing_link()
Get a sharing link for the given dataset
datastore_datasets()
List cached datasets'
datastore_example_path()
An example datastore
datastore_get_path()
Local datastore path settings
datastore_set_path()
Set the path to the refine.bio datastore
.rb_get_email_address()
internal function to get the email address for the current session
.refinebio_base
refinebio url
download_dataset()
Download an available dataset from refine.bio
extract_dataset()
Extract a downloaded dataset zipfile
extract_local_dataset()
load a list of SummarizedExperiments from an extracted RefineBio download
get_absolute_path()
Get absolute path to a file or directory
get_compendia_catalog()
All available compendia in refine.bio
get_experiment_catalog()
Complete list of all experiments in refine.bio
get_refinebio()
Get one or more experiments (GSE, SRP, etc) from RefineBio
load_dataset()
Load a dataset from a refinebio download
process_and_load_dataset()
Process and load a dataset
rb_dataset_update_state()
Get the state of a dataset
rb_email_address()
get the email address for the current session
rb_get_token()
Create or get an active API token for use in downloading from the API
rb_set_email_address()
set the email address for the current session
wait_for_dataset()
Wait for a dataset to become available
